# WebIDL Interfaces

Auto-generated WebIDL interface implementations for WHATWG specifications.

**⚠️ DO NOT EDIT FILES IN THIS DIRECTORY**

These files are generated by `zoop-codegen` from source files in `zoop_src/`.

## Regenerate

```bash
zig build codegen
```

## Source Mapping

| Generated File | Source File |
|----------------|-------------|
| `console.zig` | `zoop_src/console/console.zig` |
| `console_types.zig` | `zoop_src/console/types.zig` |
| `console_format.zig` | `zoop_src/console/format.zig` |
| `text_decoder_common.zig` | `zoop_src/encoding/text_decoder_common.zig` |
| `text_encoder_common.zig` | `zoop_src/encoding/text_encoder_common.zig` |
| `readable_stream.zig` | `zoop_src/streams/readable_stream.zig` |
| `writable_stream.zig` | `zoop_src/streams/writable_stream.zig` |
| `url.zig` | `zoop_src/url/url.zig` |
| `url_search_params.zig` | `zoop_src/url/url_search_params.zig` |

## Usage

Import from spec `root.zig` files:

```zig
// src/console/root.zig
pub const Console = @import("../../interfaces/console.zig").Console;

// src/url/root.zig
pub const URL = @import("../../interfaces/url.zig").URL;
```
